EmailTemplate.subject: Connect Seamlessly at 30,000 Feet With Ovation Select
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.constantaviation.com/]]>
Honeywell has teamed up with one of our premier authorized dealers, Constant Aviation, to offer Challenger 604 operators the latest in cabin management and entertainment with Ovation Select.®
Ovation Select’s fully digital cabin management and entertainment system, paired with new advancements like Bluetooth and Honeywell’s high-speed, Ka-band in-flight Wi-Fi connectivity solution, JetWave™, allow CL604 passengers to personalize their experience and seamlessly connect to multiple devices at 30,000 feet.
Live stream, hold a video conference, stream content and use your Bluetooth headphones to listen to it all from the convenience of your seat and at the same time – that’s the power of connecting to Honeywell’s Ovation Select with Constant Aviation.
Contact Constant Aviation today to learn more about Honeywell’s Ovation Select CMS for Challenger 604.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Constant-Aviation_Ovation-Select.html]]>
